resources.string: General introduction: This APP mainly includes two interfaces: restore system and configuration information
\tThe tool will be in Yang days, Kai days and NEW THINKCENTRE models and pre-installed WINDOWS XP and WINDOWS7, WINDOWS8, WINDOWS8.1, WINDOWS10 non-Edu models with.
2. Can I back up the WIN10 system?
\tVersion 1.0 does not support WIN7 and the following. \t1.1 version began to support UEFI boot GPT partition WIN8, WIN8.1 and WIN10.
3. u disk has no special requirements?

\tU disk performance on the software experience a greater impact, priority USB3.0 recommended equipment. From the previous test results, the more high-end U disk, the better the performance and the effect, the backup speed block, start fast. In addition, the size is also required. The software calculates a reasonable value based on the backup size, and the mobile device must be larger than the value to use.

\tWIM is an abbreviation for Microsoft Windows Imaging Format (WIM), which is a Windows file-based image format. The WIM image format also allows multiple images to be stored in an actual file. The WIM image format also enables compression and a single instance, which greatly reduces the size of the image file. WIM, although similar to the Ghost way to install the system, but more flexible than Ghost, it allows us to restore the image file to the hard disk before, select the recovery partition, and other simple configuration.
Please select the system you want to restore
